scripts.dev:all: bun run prisma:generate && concurrently "bun run dev:web" "bun run dev:backend" --names "web,backend" --prefix-colors "cyan,yellow,magenta" --kill-others
scripts.dev:native: cd native && bun run tauri dev
scripts.build:all: bun run prisma:generate && bun run build:web && bun run build:backend && bun run build:native && bun run build:extensions
scripts.build:native: cd native && bun run tauri build
scripts.generate-types: npm run generate:prisma && npm run generate:supabase
scripts.generate:supabase: supabase gen types typescript --project-id aliddllzqrcpzhiouryw > web/app/types/supabase.ts
scripts.setup: bun install && mkdir -p .husky && bunx husky install && bunx husky add .husky/pre-commit "bun run pre-commit"
scripts.pre-commit: bun run generate-types && git add web/app/types/supabase.ts backend/prisma/generated
